title: Amazon SQS FIFO queue with controlled delay
description: Amazon SQS FIFO queue with delay using AWS Lambda and Amazon DynamoDB

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern shows how to introduce a delay between processing messages while maintaining order from an individual client. The message is sent sequentially to the downstream service for processing to minimize the consequences of unordered events.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Shaun Guo
authors.bio: Shaun is a Senior Technical Account Manager at Amazon Web Services based in Australia
